subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In sale on Thursday at Christie’s under Important Pocket Watch & Wristwatches, Lot 342 may hold some interest for golf fans — a rare Patek Philippe given to Gene Sarazen in honor of winning the 1922 United States Open.
snippet: In sale on Thursday at Christie’s under Important Pocket Watch & Wristwatches, Lot 342 may hold some interest for golf fans — a rare Patek Philippe given to Gene Sarazen in honor of winning the 1922 United States Open.
